news.title: US insurance giant Aflac says hackers stole personal and health data of 22.6 million
news.summary: Aflac, one of the largest insurance companies in the U.S., confirmed hackers stole reams of personal data, including Social Security numbers, identity documents, and health information.

news.title: Judge blocks Texas app store age verification law
